tmpl API

  • tmpl_define
  • tmpl_assign
  • tmpl_getbuf
  • tmpl_hide
  • tmpl_getvars

handle tmpl_define(string filename)

load (and parse) a template

returns: template handle, or false if error

args:

filename: path/filename of the template to be loaded


bool tmpl_assign(handle template, string key, mixed value) -- or --
bool tmpl_assign(handle template, array vars)

assign php variable(s) into template namespace for potential use

returns: true on success, else false

args:

template: template handle, as returned from tmpl_define()
key: variable name
value: variable value (scalar)
vars: list of variable name/value pairs. error if value without matching key is found.


string tmpl_getbuf(handle template)

inserts assigned variables into template as appropriate and returns buffer

returns: buffer containing fully processed template output

args:

template: template handle, as returned from tmpl_define()


bool tmpl_hide(handle template, bool hide)

sets hidden state of a named template section

returns: true on success, else false

args:

template: template handle, as returned from tmpl_define()
hide: if true, hides the section, else displays it


array tmpl_getvars(handle template)

returns list of variable names/values assigned to template thus far

returns: array on success, else false

args:

template: template handle, as returned from tmpl_define()
